name: Travelindex
tag_list: travel-directory, travel-data, connecting, direct-distribution, location-directory, worldwide, local
overview:
Travelindex is building the most comprehensive travel and tourism database with human-edited, up to date and validated information accessible via the Internet and other electronic distribution channels.

With a comprehensive, validated and authenticated travel database Travelindex will redefine how travel products and services are sold and be in an enviable position to provide the underlying data to shape new distribution models.

Our Mission is to provide travellers and travel professionals with reliable, accessible and trustworthy sources of travel and tourism information.
